operation.name: findByCondition
operation.sqlmap: SELECT * from project_financial_trade_tansfer where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="projectFinancialTradeTansfer.tradeId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> trade_id = #projectFinancialTradeTansfer.tradeId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="projectFinancialTradeTansfer.applyId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> apply_id = #projectFinancialTradeTansfer.applyId# </isGreaterThan> <isNotEmpty property="projectFinancialTradeTansfer.projectCode" prepend=" and "> project_code = #projectFinancialTradeTansfer.projectCode# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="projectFinancialTradeTansfer.flowNo" prepend=" and "> flow_no = #projectFinancialTradeTansfer.flowNo# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="transferTimeStart" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start}transfer_time >= #transferTimeStart#${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="transferTimeEnd" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start}transfer_time <= #transferTimeEnd#${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty> </dynamic> <isNotEmpty property="sortCol" prepend=" order by "> $sortCol$ <isNotEmpty property="sortOrder"> $sortOrder$ </isNotEmpty> </isNotEmpty> LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#;

operation.name: findByConditionCount
operation.sqlmap: SELECT count(*) FROM project_financial_trade_tansfer where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="projectFinancialTradeTansfer.tradeId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> trade_id = #projectFinancialTradeTansfer.tradeId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="projectFinancialTradeTansfer.applyId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> apply_id = #projectFinancialTradeTansfer.applyId# </isGreaterThan> <isNotEmpty property="projectFinancialTradeTansfer.projectCode" prepend=" and "> project_code = #projectFinancialTradeTansfer.projectCode# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="projectFinancialTradeTansfer.flowNo" prepend=" and "> flow_no = #projectFinancialTradeTansfer.flowNo# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="transferTimeStart" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start}transfer_time >= #transferTimeStart#${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="transferTimeEnd" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start}transfer_time <= #transferTimeEnd#${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty> </dynamic>
